body:
Hi, 

I am a new user, I have installed on one PC in my university computer properly. But on my laptop, when I installed it, it does not work and shows following message, can anyone help me?

replies.body:
Hi,

probably you need to download [GhPython](http://www.food4rhino.com/project/ghpython?ufh) and copy that to grasshopper Libraries/components folder (unblock that by right-clicking on the gha file, and choosing properties. At the bottom of the General tab, a message about the file being blocked may appear, If so, click unblock then click ok).

Also, check [Installation instruction](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/resources/Installation_Instructions.md).

Best,

OMD
Thank you for the reply. and sorry for my late feedback. I followed the process properly but still the attached screen shows up. I do not know why it is happening.

Hi,

Please check and follow [this](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-installation-problems) discussion.
